edu.wpi.grip.core.serialization

Class ProjectSettingsConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.AbstractReflectionConverter
      • com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter
        • edu.wpi.grip.core.serialization.ProjectSettingsConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Converter, com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConverterMatcher, com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.Caching

    public class ProjectSettingsConverter
extends com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConverter
    XStream converter for ProjectSettings.

    Settings are serialized using XStream's built-in reflection serialization. The only catch is that a ProjectSettingsChangedEvent must be posted after new settings are loaded.
